title: President's Day Nightmare
guest_stars: Craig McCracken, Pat Ventura, Van Partible, Eugene Mattos, Genndy Tartakovsky, Dian Parkinson
synopsis: Space Ghost shows off his versatility by emceeing Cartoon Network's "World Premiere Toon In." Members of the Council of Doom appear as judges in a beauty pageant-style competition between five cartoon directors. Blip also makes an appearance, prompting Space Ghost to croon, "Oh, what a monkey he is!"

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Tonight! Live from Ghost Planet! It's the 1st Annual World Premiere Toon In! (Polaroids fly in) With special guests! Brak! Van Partible! Lokar! Pat Ventura! Metallus! Craig McCracken! Black Widow! Genndy Tartakovsky! Tansut! and Geno Mattos! Ladies and gentlemen, please welcome, The Council of Doom. (curtain raises)

transcript.speaker: Council of Doom
transcript.dialogue: We're from outer space,we're an evil disgrace!

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: We spread germs and diseaseall over the place!

transcript.speaker: Council of Doom
transcript.dialogue: But now we're hereand we're full of beer

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Full of beeeeeer! (subtitle: HELLO MY NAME IS BRAK!)

transcript.speaker: Black Widow
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost is so prettyI could hold him dear! (music stops)

transcript.speaker: Black Widow
transcript.dialogue: Okay, okay! I hate him! (music resumes)

transcript.speaker: Council of Doom
transcript.dialogue: We hate em too,he's like a bad haiku

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Haiku! (subtitle: HELLO MY NAME IS BRAK!)

transcript.speaker: Metallus
transcript.dialogue: (Drones) (subtitle, with bouncing ball: BUT HE GAVE US ALL A PARDON / SO, WHAT COULD WE DO?)

transcript.speaker: Council of Doom
transcript.dialogue: So we're nice again,Yeah! We're all good sports,and we're here to judge theWorld Pre-mier Shorts!

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Tonight's broadcast extravaganza will be simulcast on TBS, TNT and the Cartoon Network. And now, your host for the evening, The Principal of Outer Space! Spaaaace Ghooooost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in)(coughs during introduction) Greetings! I'm Space Ghost, from Coast to Coast, on the Cartoon Network! Welcome to the First Annual World Premiere Toon In! (aside) We're rolling as we speak, still? Okay, good. (to camera) Tonight, five directors from the Hanna-Barbera Cartoon Studio will compete against each other, in front of an audience of millions and millions, for a big prize! (fanfare) Each director will be judged in random categories by the Council of Doom! The winner will be the winner when he wins! And the winning director will have his cartoon premiered at the end of the show?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay. Here to tell you how the votes are tabulated, from the Accounting Firm of Price Westinghouse, Blip the monkey!

transcript.speaker: Blip the Monkey
transcript.dialogue: (on stage in a tuxedo) (squeaks and squeaks)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Huh? What are you saying, Blip? What are you saying?!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I can't understand a word you're saying! Okay, get the monkey off the stage. Now, let's meet the judges, the Council Of Doom.

transcript.speaker: (Judges, from left to right
transcript.dialogue: Lokar, Metallus, Black Widow, Tansut, Brak)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Tansut, a vicious alien from the SK system! He likes to mold things out of scalding hot tar.

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: Hi Mom! Hi Dad! (makes peace signs) Predicate!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Heh heh, oh-kay. Three time Nascar Champion and conqueror of the Dust Mite Planet, Brak!

transcript.speaker: Black Widow
transcript.dialogue: Mmmmmm! You look really good in those tights, honey!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Next, Metallus, an armored warrior whose mere glance is enough to strike fear into the hearts of those weaker than he. (looks evil, making droning sound) He collects fridge magnets and is a champion speed knitter.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And finally, Lokar! A hideous locust who hails from the east. He enjoys literature and books, and he likes to read colorful pamphlets to orphans.

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: Thank you Space Ghost, I'm esteemed.

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: Oh please, Zorak, your insipid habit of barking out ludicrous commands is nothing more than a blatant display of your lack of intelligence.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh. Thank you, Lokar. That's just about the dumbest thing I ever heard!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey now! You bugs be nice!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Alrighty, who will be our first director? Dian?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh-kay. (pauses, looks around studio) Have you ever noticed the beautiful lighting in this studio?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah. (breaking sound off screen) What's a Toon In?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: The first category is Director's Composure Under Extreme Interrogation! Our first contestant is Pat Ventura!

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: (whispering) Tonight's contestants have been briefed on the rules governing each category. What you are about to see is real, these are not actors, they're directors.

transcript.speaker: Pat Ventura
transcript.dialogue: Well, thank you very much, I...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Not yet, you clowns! Sorry, uh, tell us about your cartoon!

transcript.speaker: Pat Ventura
transcript.dialogue: Yuckie Duck is a very hapless, uh, character. He try to please but no one appreciates it, it's like the world against him. (pause) Everything he touches just fouls up.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (long pause) Let's look at the clip!

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: (with French translation in background) Tansut, twelve point two. Black Widow, one hundred nine. Brak, "Hello my name is Brak."

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What is it with you and Talking Ducks?

transcript.speaker: Pat Ventura
transcript.dialogue: (clears throat) Well, being a cartoon character, he just can do anything. He'll talk, and... I guess he talks because we just give him a voice.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You just decide on his voice, just like that.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (mocking Pat a la Butthead) Uh huh huh, uh huh huh...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay Pat! Solve the puzzle! (Pat doesn't have time to respond)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hmmmm, not so good. Do you sing?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sings, in monotone) Don't sing, don't dance. What do you do... Pat?

transcript.speaker: Pat Ventura
transcript.dialogue: Well, you can do a cartoon with just...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay, I'm doing a cartoon, here we go, I am a cartoon! What's my motivation? Where am I? Why am I? What are the other characters doing?

transcript.speaker: Pat Ventura
transcript.dialogue: I guess the characters are doing superhuman feats in themselves.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Likin' it! They're doing feats and I come in and I say...?

transcript.speaker: Pat Ventura
transcript.dialogue: Hello, and my name is Pat Ventura.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (bad acting, straight) "Hello, and my name is Pat Ventura!" Directing category! Council gives...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ooooh. Sliding. Well, thanks, Pat! We'll see you at the end of the show!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're welcome! My next contestant is Van Partible!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey, do you know Rick Flair?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, Van, it's a trick! He'll take your whole hand!

transcript.speaker: Van Partible
transcript.dialogue: No, I doubt it, but it would be funny... that would be comedy.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Wait a second, Chester, blood is not funny.

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: (Ding!) Blood is funny! Van is the winner!

transcript.speaker: Van Partible
transcript.dialogue: I totally love the Ghost Planet.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Citizen Van, you chose the danish, why?

transcript.speaker: Van Partible
transcript.dialogue: I have no idea, it was the only thing there, it was either a bagel or this cream cheese frosting thing.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Council would have chosen the bagel. Bad decision, Van.

transcript.speaker: Van Partible
transcript.dialogue: See, what I'm trying to do is chew and talk at the same time...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Talking with your mouth full category! Council gives...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ooooh, Van, things aren't lookin' good. Bad manners are never en vogue.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You can do better than that, Van!

transcript.speaker: Van Partible
transcript.dialogue: I... (long pause) (shrugs) I guess you're a critic.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: We'll be back in two and two!

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Only one cartoon will win! Which one will it be? Stay tuned to find out.

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Oh goody! The World Premiere Toon In franchise is back! Excited? I am.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Welcome back! Our next contestant is Geno Mattos!

transcript.speaker: Geno Mattos
transcript.dialogue: Whew! Just beamed in from the old Enterprise, uh, thought I'd say hi!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Goose eggs. Ha ha ha! But you'll have a chance to make that up. Tell us what you do!

transcript.speaker: Geno Mattos
transcript.dialogue: I am a animation director, designer, uh, on the show "Shake and Flick."

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You must answer in the form of a walrus!

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: Pardon the intrusion, don't you mean, question?

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: No, lower brain form, you mean, he should answer in the form of a question.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes, he should question in the form of an answer! Good answer! Question the answer, Gino!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're good, buddy boy! Now for the clincher... (drum roll)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You wouldn't understand my shouting Braille when there's a blender in the oven.

transcript.speaker: Geno Mattos
transcript.dialogue: Uh, because our deflector shields were up and our communication was kinda garbled?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uhhhh, we'll have to check with the judges, hold on!

transcript.speaker: Geno Mattos
transcript.dialogue: This is my fifteen seconds of, royal fame.

transcript.speaker: Geno Mattos
transcript.dialogue: Okay, was I hammin' it up a little too much?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay! My next contestant is Genndy Tartakovsky. (appears on monitor)

transcript.speaker: Genndy Tartakovsky
transcript.dialogue: It's good to be here Space Ghost, thank you.

transcript.speaker: Genndy Tartakovsky
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, Dexter is a boy genius and, uh...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ooooh, (Ding!) what do you say to that Comrade?

transcript.speaker: Genndy Tartakovsky
transcript.dialogue: Well, he can go and just have his own opinion and it won't bother me at all.

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: (in background) Hey! (Ding!) Hey, looky here! (Ding! Ding! Ding! Ding! Ding!) Hey, look at me! (Ding! Ding!)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (looks at Brak, annoyed) Self-restraint category! Council gives... Council gives...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (mocking) Thank you, Space Ghost. (normal voice) Our last and final contestant is Craig McCracken!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Citizen Craig McCracken, Come on down! (monitor lowers)

transcript.speaker: Craig McCracken
transcript.dialogue: Thanks. It's good to be here.

transcript.speaker: Craig McCracken
transcript.dialogue: Uh, I make cartoons. I make, uh, the Power Puff Girls, about these three little kindergarten-age superheroes who fly around and beat up bad guys.

transcript.speaker: Craig McCracken
transcript.dialogue: Um, Why aren't you like a big sheet just with, like, eyes cut in it, goin' like (motions) "Woooh!" and scary? I mean, why is that? I mean, that's like a ghost.

transcript.speaker: Craig McCracken
transcript.dialogue: You know, I don't, I don't understand this whole yellow cape black hood thing. It's kinda strange to me.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm not a scary ghost, Jim! I'm a Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes! I'm the savior of the universe! A mature crime-fighter of all evil!

transcript.speaker: Craig McCracken
transcript.dialogue: I don't, I don't, uh, think crime fighting takes any specific age.

transcript.speaker: Craig McCracken
transcript.dialogue: Okay, I mean, even babies could save the day if they had to.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (raises his armband, as if to fire)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And it's not funny... is it?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Alrighty! Now it's time to tabulate the scores and determine tonight's winning director! (tympani roll) Moltar?

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Don't move. Not a muscle. The winning cartoon is coming up! Right after these messages.

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Ah, there's more. We now return to the conclusion of The Cartoon Network's World Premiere Toon In. Let me do that again.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It's a tie! I think. Idn't it?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Here he comes!It's a tie!It's a beautiful burnt sienna tie for me!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I want green,to match my spleen,Oh, what a beautiful tie!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Look at Blip,He is small,Oh, what a monkey he is!

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: (pausing deliberately, as though he's translating) Ahem. He said, since it's a tie, yes, I believe it's 'tie', you must have a tie-breaker.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, since it's a tie we'll have a swimsuit competition! (low voice) Lose the primate!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: The tie-breaker category is the Swimsuit Competition! Citizen Pat Ventura! Go!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Disqualified! (zaps him off of screen) Van Partible! Swimsuit! Go!

transcript.speaker: Van Partible
transcript.dialogue: (appears on screen, still eating, mouth full) Do I look at anybody?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Disqualified! (zaps him off of screen) Geno Mattos! Swimsuit! Go!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Disqualified! (zaps him off screen) Last contestant! Craig McCracken! Swimsuit! Go!

transcript.speaker: Craig McCracken
transcript.dialogue: (appears in swimsuit, life jacket, water wings, fins, mask and snorkel, posing & waving; disco music plays)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And the winner of the 1st Annual Toon In is... Craig McCracken! (Craig holds flowers and weeps, a tiara on his head)

transcript.speaker: Craig McCracken
transcript.dialogue: (talking through mask and snorkel, blowing kisses) Thank you, Space Ghost, oh, I love them, thank you, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Goodnight everybody! You're beautiful! Here's the winning cartoon that won the winning... oh, roll the cartoon.
